insert:
select SEQ_ERPC_WST_PAY2.NEXTVAL as ERP_INS_ID2 from DUAL
INSERT INTO ERPC_WST_PAY2 ( ERP_INS_ID2 ,ERP_INS_ID2
,PAYER_ID2
,PAYER_NO
,PAY_DATE
,ABSTRACT
,TR_TYPE
,AMOUNT
,CURRENCY
,RECE_ACC_NO
,RECE_ACC_NAME
,REG_NO
,RECE_OPBANK_NO
,RECE_OPBANK_NAME
,RECE_CNAPS
,URGENT_FLAG
,PERSONALFLAG
,CREATOR
,CREATE_TIME
,TEXTVALUE1
,TEXTVALUE2
,TEXTVALUE3
,TEXTVALUE4
,TEXTVALUE5
,NUMBERVALUE1
,NUMBERVALUE3
,DATEVALUE1
,DATEVALUE2
,DATEVALUE3
) VALUES (
#ERP_INS_ID2#
<${isNot} property="ERP_INS_ID2">,#ERP_INS_ID2#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="PAYER_ID2">,#PAYER_ID2#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="PAYER_NO">,#PAYER_NO#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="PAY_DATE">,#PAY_DATE#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="ABSTRACT">,#ABSTRACT#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="TR_TYPE">,#TR_TYPE#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="AMOUNT">,#AMOUNT#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="CURRENCY">,#CURRENCY#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="RECE_ACC_NO">,#RECE_ACC_NO#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="RECE_ACC_NAME">,#RECE_ACC_NAME#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="REG_NO">,#REG_NO#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="RECE_OPBANK_NO">,#RECE_OPBANK_NO#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="RECE_OPBANK_NAME">,#RECE_OPBANK_NAME#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="RECE_CNAPS">,#RECE_CNAPS#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="URGENT_FLAG">,#URGENT_FLAG#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="PERSONALFLAG">,#PERSONALFLAG#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="CREATOR">,#CREATOR#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="CREATE_TIME">,#CREATE_TIME#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="TEXTVALUE1">,#TEXTVALUE1#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="TEXTVALUE2">,#TEXTVALUE2#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="TEXTVALUE3">,#TEXTVALUE3#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="TEXTVALUE4">,#TEXTVALUE4#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="TEXTVALUE5">,#TEXTVALUE5#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="NUMBERVALUE1">,#NUMBERVALUE1#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="NUMBERVALUE3">,#NUMBERVALUE3#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="DATEVALUE1">,#DATEVALUE1#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="DATEVALUE2">,#DATEVALUE2#</${isNot}>
<${isNot} property="DATEVALUE3">,#DATEVALUE3#</${isNot}>
)
